content: If you go to glen becks website...www.glenbeck.com ..U will see info about this..we all need to take part in our countries..future...not just be bystanders..if you are fine with the way things are..then good you sit idely by and let it happen..however, there are some of us who are afraid...that things might go in a direction we do not wish it to go...socialism is not a funny word..its a reality..one i have been aware of for a long time. I lived in england and saw it first hand...communism is a reality as well..it sneeks up on you and catches you unaware...and it makes you think its the right thing to do by its description...but I have seen it first hand before the end of the so called cold war..it destroys life..and I do not want life as I know it here in America the great destroyed because..a few good men decided to sit on their laurels and do nothing...we watch it happen..a good example...the terri shiavo thing..she was murdered by our own government..wow..how did that sneak by...a man allowed to kill his wife..with gov approval..because he said..she wouldnt want to live that way...mind you she coudlnt say anything at that time for herself and he said...mind you get this...he said..there was no writen paper about it..and he had already moved on had children illegaly with some woman he couldnt make legal because his wife was still alive..but it happened....a woman who was otherwise healthy...was denied food and then she died..so what else is new read below from glen becks account and then go to his site..www.glenbeck.com WE Surround Them March 9, 2009 - 0:18 ET We Surround Them-The Unveiling March 13th on FOX News 5pm ET Host or Attend a Viewing Party Sign up on meetup.com to join the WE Surround them Viewing Party. Where is your gathering taking place? Let us know. Click the ‘more details about this meet up’ link to leave your comment... Radio stations participating in the We Surround Them gathering party Find a Viewing Party Click on your state to add/find a party near you. Share this page with your friends and family... Do you watch the direction that America is being taken in and feel powerless to stop it? Do you believe that your voice isn’t loud enough to be heard above the noise anymore? Do you read the headlines everyday and feel an empty pit in your stomach…as if you’re completely alone? If so, then you’ve fallen for the Wizard of Oz lie. While the voices you hear in the distance may sound intimidating, as if they surround us from all sides—the reality is very different. Once you pull the curtain away you realize that there are only a few people pressing the buttons, and their voices are weak. The truth is that they don’t surround us at all. We surround them. So, how do we show America what’s really behind the curtain? Below are nine simple principles. If you believe in at least seven of them, then we have something in common. I urge you to read the instructions at the end for how to help make your voice heard. The Nine Principles 1. America is good. 2. I believe in God and He is the Center of my Life. 3. I must always try to be a more honest person than I was yesterday. 12 Values Honesty Reverence Hope Thrift Humility Charity Sincerity Moderation Hard Work Courage Personal Responsibility Friendship 4. The family is sacred. My spouse and I are the ultimate authority, not the government. 5. If you break the law you pay the penalty. Justice is blind and no one is above it. 6. I have a right to life, liberty and pursuit of happiness, but there is no guarantee of equal results. 7. I work hard for what I have and I will share it with who I want to. Government cannot force me to be charitable. 8. It is not un-American for me to disagree with authority or to share my personal opinion. 9. The government works for me. I do not answer to them, they answer to me. You Are Not Alone If you agree with at least seven of those principles, then you are not alone. then stay tuned to the radio and television shows over the coming weeks to see how we intend to pull back the curtain.

It shall be interesting "to see how we intend to pull back the curtain". Will it be something like that ridiculous Sean Hannity poll - the one that talked of armed revolt, mass mutiny of the Armed Forces or sucession (and no option to vote "follow the law and vote out the Democrats at the next election" - you know, the American Way?)? content: I watched fox always and then i would go to cnn just to get a softer side of the news until it got too sickly....making fun of george bush...and how great our heavenly obama is..then i saw glen beck..I thought what is that on cnn..wow ..can that be...once in awhile great speakers are on the wrong show.. then bang..he showed up on fox..yep the right show..he is our RUSH LIMBAUGH from the clinton days...we survived that nightmare because of RUSH LIMBAUGH.. they had to get him somehow .you know the left ..the liberals..He can't last with all his truth..which was always proved in the end.. so they got him on pain killers...I know what back pain is about..I have two ruptured disks..because of RUSH LIMBAUGH...I knew to be careful with pain pills...my dr kept giving me pain pills because he saw how bad things were. then he gave me high doses of NSAIDS..NAPROXEN..and told me to take it for a long time..almost killed me..eroded my esophagus and stomach.. my husband has hydrochodone for his horrible back pain..he has had it for a long time..he takes it sparinly...because we know now.. too bad drs now...only treat the final result..they dont want to cure you any more..well, not all drs...some are great and get to the root..find the problem and eliminate it...then you dont have to take a bunch of drugs..ramble ramble ramble...yea right she does talk too much haha so watch closely...glen beck...they the liberals will look for something ...glen isnt perfect he will tell you straight up..he changed himself...his pills are M&M candy..haha ...keep watching..you go glen..
